Articles

Using the RStan package

These vignettes provide an introduction to fitting a model in RStan, extracting the important contents from fitted model objects, including external C++ code in a Stan program, and performing simulation based calibration.

RStan: the R interface to Stan
Accessing the contents of a stanfit object
Interfacing with External C++ Code
Simulation Based Calibration

Developed by Jiqiang Guo, Jonah Gabry, Ben Goodrich, Andrew Johnson, Sebastian Weber.
